text.section: Except as specifically provided in subsection (1) of this section, supplies or equipment used to deliver a drug to a patient are taxable.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 17, effective July 1, 2009. -- Amended 2008 Ky. metadata.lrc-note: (8/1/2008). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has inserted subparagraph and subdivision designations in subsection (3)(f) of this statute during codification. The words in the text were not changed.
